title: Analysis of f based on table of values for f, f' part - c

content.question: Find a positive real number r having the property that there must exist a value c with 0 < c < 0.5 and f''(c) = r. Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Find a positive real number r having the property that there must exist a value c with 0 < c < 0.5 and f''(c) = r. Give a reason for your answer.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
